page.title: 19RESIDENT OF CLIFFSEND
page.content: I have a wife and 3 children.we live in a 4 bedroom detached house in a rural setting.My wife and I are both graduated teachers and our childrens' ages are 10,9 and 1 years old. I am a full time secondary teacher of the Humanities.My wife teaches parttime.We have 2 cars,one T.V. set,several radios,a vacuum cleaner,a refrigerator and a deepfreeze.We belong to the local church and I am a Lay Reader and my wife plays the organ regularly. My day consists of: 7.30 Get up and have breakfast. 8.25 Leave for school,start at 8.50. 12.30 Lunch for one hour(sandwiches). 3.30 Finish school,home by 4.15. 6.00 Evening meal with family. 10.30 Retire to bed. At the weekends we do our shopping, watch T.V. and generally relax.I like walking,running and reading.
